summary:
In this mod, you have all the members of the *Mercenary Guild*(mod) and two hired mercenaries from the *Mercenaries*(mod), they are both master archers though... I assigned them to some places in \\\"Knifepoint Ridge\\\"(You go there to clear the bandits when the Jarl of Falkreath asks you) 
And as normal followers, You have Jack, John the Slayer,
descriptionHtml:
In this mod, you have all the members of the *Mercenary Guild*(mod) and two hired mercenaries from the *Mercenaries*(mod), they are both master archers though... I assigned them to some places in \\\"Knifepoint Ridge\\\"(You go there to clear the bandits when the Jarl of Falkreath asks you) 
And as normal followers, You have Jack, John the Slayer, Jason, James and Riza (from guns mod for skyrim)

BTW, i changed all the 4 followers faces and names to;
Jack-Faendal, Erik the Slayer-John the Slayer, Belrand-Jason, and Cosnach-James...

Your Character is an imperial... I mastered the smithing skill, so your character and your followers except Riza have cool and strong armors... for Riza, i cant change her armor i dunno why...

F.Y.I., Some of the mercs are inside the knifepoint mine.
author: ThEArcheR1907
